snippet.title: Lingering Souls Trailer
snippet.description:
Psychological Horror Realism Game: Lingering Souls.
Public Prologue demo now available! https://azagamestudio.itch.io/lingering-souls
Artyom's sister has passed away in his parents old apartment.
Now you must search the apartment for things you want to keep in her memory. She had a camera she particularly loved, which you intend to keep.

All footage is WIP

Created by Aza Game Studio.
Follow: https://twitter.com/AzaGameStudio
Itch: https://azagamestudio.itch.io/
Sountrack composed and produced by "Vivek Abhishek"
@VIVEKABHISHEK
